entry.title: Full text search for trac with apache solr
entry.summary:
Summary

[EuroPython 2012] A Willmer- 5 JULY 2012 in "Track Ravioli"

Description

Trac is a widely used integrated bug, wiki and source control interface for managing software projects. Itâ€™s very extensible and a wide range of plugins are available. We shall present a newly written full text search plugin for Trac that uses Apache Solr to make all parts of trac searchable - including the source code repository and all file attachments. The session will introduce Solr and show how it can be integrated into a Python project -including the pitfalls to avoid and the more useful features.
